title: Everyone & Secret Messages
description: Comedian Emmy Blotnick and Emma find a message in a bottle, learn what not to do with cheese, and Domee Shi, director of Pixar's "Turning Red" talks about her Harry Potter fan fiction.

itunes:summary: Emma chats with Emmy Blotnick, Anna Holmes, and Domee Shi.
